description: Come stay in my quirky nook that I call HOME. My place is super close to the subway and steps from the best jerk chicken in the land!! There is constant energy in the neighborhood and an unbeatable proximity to Prospect Park - perfect for picnics, biking, running or just chillin'!  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: 1 BR - Prospect Park Charmer
review: The apartment is stylish and well-furnished, and in an interesting, diverse neighborhood, just one block from the subway. Shawn herself is a sweetheart: warm, gregarious, and helpful. We had a lovely stay and heartily recommend Shawn's apartment to other Airbnbers.
